6 Day Split - Push Pull Legs x 2

Monday - Push SetsxReps Tuesday - Pull SetsxReps Wednesday - Legs SetsxReps Thursday - Push SetsxReps Friday - Pull SetsxReps Saturday - Legs SetsxReps
Bench Press 3x5-8 Barbell Row 3x8-10 Squat 3x5-8 Overhead Press 3x5-8 T-Bar Row 3x8-10 Deadlift 3x5
Incline Dumbbell Bench 3x8-10 Pull-up 3x8-10 Romanian Deadlift 3x8-10 Incline Bench Press 3x8-10 Lat-Pulldown 3x8-10 Front Squat 3x8-10
Cable Fly 3x10-12 Cable Row 3x12-15 Leg Press 4x12-15 Dumbbell Overhead Press 3x8-10 Single Arm Row 3x12-15 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15
Dips 3x10-12 Face Pull 3x12-15 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15 Cable Overhead Extension 3x12-15 Upright Row 3x12-15 Leg Extension 4x12-15
Skullcrusher 3x12-15 Cable Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Dumbbell Curl 3x12-14 Tricep Pushdown 3x12-15 Cable Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Barbell Curl 3x8-10
Dumbbell Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Calf Raises 5x12-15 Hammer Curl 3x12-15 Dumbbell Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Calf Raises 5x12-15 Hammer Curl 3x12-15
